alert.note: Alert for Benton (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 3:30AM EDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Benton County through 400 AM EDT... At 330 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Oxford, or near Fowler, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fowler, Otterbein, Oxford, Boswell, Swanington and Templeton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
